title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai warns of AI spending 'irrationality'
description: Google boss Sundar Pichai admitted that he sees some “irrationality” driving the artificial intelligence boom – and warned that “no company” would emerge unscathed if the bubble bursts.
content:
Google boss Sundar Pichai admitted that he sees some “irrationality” driving the artificial intelligence boom – and warned that “no company” would emerge unscathed if the bubble bursts.

title: RS21 Joins AWS Select Partner Network to Accelerate Data Readiness for AI Adoption
description: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M., Nov. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The AWS Select Partner designation - reserved for partners with proven technical excellence and measurable customer impact - places RS21 among the most trusted leaders helping organizations nationwide prepare their data for artificial intelligence (AI) adoption.

title: Unpreparedness for risks a worry for CEOs: Kroll Chief Jacob Silverman
description: In an era where uncertainty reigns, CEOs are wrestling with a sense of inadequacy in the face of escalating risks. Geopolitical tensions and the ever-present threat of cyber attacks are sparking alarm bells. As artificial intelligence weaves itself deeper into the fabric of business, it serves as a double-edged sword, amplifying both potential rewards and hazards.

title: Views of Consciousness, Human and A.I.
description: Readers respond to a guest essay about artificial (and human) intelligence and consciousness. Also: Kennedy Center ripple effects; cobblestone streets.
content:

title: Why are US stocks down: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq slide as Nvidia earnings loom
description: Investors are becoming nervous about high valuations in artificial intelligence (AI) companies and growing uncertainty about the economy. The result has been one of the toughest weeks for US markets in a long time.
content: US stocks fell sharply on Tuesday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropping more than 600 points. This is the fifth straight day of losses for the Dow, wiping out almost 2,000 points in total. S&P 500 also declined by 1.2% in its fourth consecu... [1844 chars]

title: Scientists urge careful evaluation before applying AI virtual staining in healthcare workflows
description: Artificial intelligence has exploded in popularity in recent years, and many proponents are excited about its potential uses in medicine: for example, processing samples quickly or identifying markers of disease that may be missed by the human eye.

title: Microsoft partners with Anthropic and Nvidia in cloud infrastructure deal
description: Microsoft said Tuesday it is partnering with artificial intelligence company Anthropic and chipmaker Nvidia as part of a cloud infrastructure deal that moves the software giant further away from its longtime alliance with OpenAI.
